card.text: Bloodthirst 3 Flying {R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Skyhunter Skirmisher
card.text: Flying, double strike

card.name: Smash to Smithereens
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Smokebraider
card.text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.

card.name: Somber Hoverguard
card.text: Affinity for artifacts Flying

card.name: Soulbright Flamekin
card.text: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Spectral Procession
card.text: Put three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Spellskite
card.text: {PU}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite.

card.name: Sphere of the Suns
card.text: Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Spikeshot Elder
card.text: {1}{R}{R}: Spikeshot Elder deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Spitebellows
card.text: When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature. Evoke {1}{R}{R}

card.name: Splinter Twin
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Put a token that's a copy of this creature onto the battlefield. That token has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Spread the Sickness
card.text: Destroy target creature, then proliferate.

card.name: Steady Progress
card.text: Proliferate. Draw a card.

card.name: Stoic Rebuttal
card.text: Metalcraft - Stoic Rebuttal costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts. Counter target spell.

card.name: Stormblood Berserker
card.text: Bloodthirst 2 Stormblood Berserker can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Sundering Vitae
card.text: Convoke Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Sunforger
Sunlance
card.text: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

card.name: Sunspear Shikari
card.text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

card.name: Surgical Extraction
card.text: #_({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)_# Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Surrakar Spellblade
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Surrakar Spellblade. Whenever Surrakar Spellblade deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

card.name: Swans of Bryn Argoll
card.text: Flying If a source would deal damage to Swans of Bryn Argoll, prevent that damage. The source's controller draws cards equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Sylvan Bounty
card.text: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G}

card.name: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
card.text: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tarmogoyf
card.text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

card.name: Telling Time
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Terashi's Grasp
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Tezzeret the Seeker
card.text: +1: Untap up to two target artifacts. -X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. -5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

card.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
card.text: Draw two cards, then proliferate.

card.name: Thief of Hope
card.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Soulshift 2

card.name: Thoughtcast
card.text: Affinity for artifacts Draw two cards.

card.name: Thrive
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.

card.name: Thrummingbird
card.text: Flying Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate.

card.name: Thunderblust
card.text: Haste Thunderblust has trample as long as it has a -1/-1 counter on it. Persist

card.name: Tribal Flames
card.text: Domain - Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Tukatongue Thallid
card.text: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Tumble Magnet
card.text: Tumble Magnet enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.

card.name: Ulamog's Crusher
card.text: Annihilator 2 Ulamog's Crusher attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
card.text: When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent. Indestructible Annihilator 4 When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

card.name: Vampire Outcasts
card.text: Bloodthirst 2 Lifelink

card.name: Vapor Snag
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.text: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

card.name: Vengeful Rebirth
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to target creature or player. Exile Vengeful Rebirth.

card.name: Viashino Slaughtermaster
card.text: Double strike {B}{G}: Viashino Slaughtermaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Vigean Graftmage
card.text: Graft 2 {1}{U}: Untap target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Vines of Vastwood
card.text: Kicker {G} Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If Vines of Vastwood was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Waking Nightmare
card.text: Target player discards two cards.

card.name: Water Servant
card.text: {U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Waxmane Baku
card.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Waxmane Baku. {1}, Remove X ki counters from Waxmane Baku: Tap X target creatures.

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wildfire
card.text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

card.name: Wilt-Leaf Liege
card.text: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Wilt-Leaf Liege, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Wings of Velis Vel
card.text: Changeling Until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 4/4, gains all creature types, and gains flying.

card.name: Wolfbriar Elemental
card.text: Multikicker {G} When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Worldheart Phoenix
card.text: Flying You may cast Worldheart Phoenix from your graveyard by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than paying its mana cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Wrap in Flames
card.text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Wrecking Ball
card.text: Destroy target creature or land.
